snippet: Albany-watchers said it could be days before one party will be able to claim control of the Senate.
abstract: New York State Democrats say they believe they will take control of State Senate--currently the last significant power base of Republicans in Albany--after winning several critical legislative races; precise results of the election will likely not be clear for a number of days.
lead_paragraph: Albany-watchers said it could be days before one party will be able to claim control of the Senate.

headline.seo: Republicans Try to Keep Control of New York State Senate
headline.main: G.O.P. in Surprise Fight to Hold New York Senate
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. in Surprise Fight To Hold New York Senate
